history.content:
SenseTime is the world’s most valuable artificial intelligence company focusing on responsible AI technologies that advance the world’s economies, society and humanity for a better tomorrow. With our roots in the academic world, we invest in fundamental research to further our understanding and advance the state of art in AI technology and are one of the most prolific contributors of related papers in the research community.

 

The International Research & Development Center(IRDC) at SenseTime leads the presences of our AI technologies in overseas markets including Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Saudi Arabia, and the United Arab Emirates. Our team comprises of researchers from top universities like Tsinghua University, Peking University, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, and Nanyang Technological University, etc. We maintain academic collaborations through joint laboratories with research institutions and universities.

 

As a member of our team, you will work on some of the most cutting-edge computer vision technology, collaborating with world-class researchers and engineers, and publish in top international conferences/journals. Our research focuses include but not limited to:

-Unsupervised Learning

-ML Systems

-Computer Vision for AR/VR applications

-ML Theory

-AI Fairness

 

We are hiring both full-time and intern researchers. The ideal candidate should be motivated and talented, with substantial experiences in deep learning/computer vision. Detailed descriptions listed below.

 

 

Job title: Computer Vision Researcher

Type: Full-time

Locations: Shenzhen, China; Shanghai, China; Beijing, China; Tokyo, Japan

Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for computer vision / deep learning algorithm design, development, and iteration, etc.
  • Lead and drive one or more research topics, including few-shot learning, un/self-/semi-supervised learning, etc.
  • Suggest and engage in the innovation and implementation of algorithms and maintain our leading position of research in academia and industry.
  • Collaborate with the teams to promote the landing of real-world projects.

Qualifications:

Minimum qualifications

  • Master candidate or above in Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, and related field.
  • Experience in computer Vision, deep Learning algorithms and applications.
  • Programming experience in one or more of C/C++, Python, etc.
  • Experience with at least one of the deep learning frameworks, e.g., Caffe, TensorFlow, PyTorch.
  • Innovative at work; passionate about solving challenging problems; excellent analytical and problem-solving skills; good team player and communication skills.

Preferred qualifications

  • PhD in Computer Science, or related technical fields.
  • Relevant working/intern experience in industry, or research experience at top universities or research institutes.
  • Published papers in top-tier conferences as the first author(s), e.g., CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, NIPS, ICML, ICLR, etc.
  • Owner or developer of popular open-source projects.
  • Experience in programming competitions including ACM-ICPC, SC-SCC, etc.
  • Experience in machine learning/computer vision related competitions, including ImageNet, COCO, Kaggle, etc.
  • Sufficient Japanese proficiency for general tasks.

 

 

Job title: Computer Vision Research Intern

Type: Internship

Minimum length: 3 months

Locations: Shenzhen, China; Shanghai, China; Beijing, China; Tokyo, Japan

Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for computer vision / deep learning algorithm design, development, and iteration, etc.
  • Engage in one or more research topics, including few-shot learning, un/self-/semi-supervised learning, etc.
  • Collaborate with the teams to promote the landing of real-world projects. 

Qualifications:

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor candidate or above in Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, and related field.
  • Experience in computer vision, deep learning algorithms and applications.
  • Programming experience in one or more of C/C++, Python, etc.
  • Experience with at least one of the deep learning frameworks, e.g., Caffe, TensorFlow, PyTorch.
  • Innovative at work; passionate about solving challenging problems; excellent analytical and problem-solving skills; good team player and communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Relevant working/intern experience in industry, or research experience at top universities or research institutes.
  • Published papers in top-tier conferences as the first author(s), e.g., CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, NIPS, ICML, ICLR, etc.
  • Owner or developer of popular open-source projects.
  • Experience in programming competitions including ACM-ICPC, SC-SCC, etc.
  • Experience in machine learning/computer vision related competitions, including ImageNet, COCO, Kaggle, etc.
  • Sufficient Japanese proficiency for general tasks.

 

If you are interested, please feel free to send your resume to geyixiao1@sensetime.com
